titleStmt.title: A discourse of the state of health in the island of Jamaica with a provision therefore calculated from the air, the place, and the water, the customs and manner of living &c. / by Thomas Trapham ...
titleStmt.author: Trapham, Thomas, d. 1692?

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
